title: MiniMap
description: A Mini Map in seconds Mini-map, Mini_Map
longDescription:
Preview: youtube.com/watch?v=WxLaJSkNqQQ

With this MiniMap you will find that it is quick and easy to setup. However, it's no slouch.

There will be no fussing with actors or blueprints for this setup. You can just name them as you see them. The system behind this minimap was built on a few core goals.

- Easy to use
- Self contained
- Flexible

The features that are offered in this pack are as follows:

- Built in Zoom (works with the scroll wheel)
- Circular and Square tracking supported
- Edge tracking (for when the tracked object goes beyond the edge of the minimap)
- Click the minimap to return the 3D space equivalent

Assets provided:

Example Content from video:

- Actors
---TestActor (box used to display 2D to 3D space position on click feature)
- Map
---ExampleMap (Test map to show example)
- Materials
---MMFrame (Frame for circular minimap as shown in video)
---MMGrid (Background grid for minimap as shown in video)
- Textures
---PlayerArrow2 (Green Arrow used to represent the player in the video)
---TestCircle (Used for alpha to create circular minimap)
---TestCircleBevel (Used to Create the bevel look in MMFrame)
- UMG
---TestWidget (Example widget from video)

Functional (Needed) Content:

- UMG
---MMTrackingImage (Custom image widget)
---TrackingWidget (Brains behind the tracking system)
---MiniMap (Final product, master of tracking widgets)

Notes: Not required but a special thanks in credits is always appreciated.

Make it a great day.
technicalDetails:
TLDR; Remove from parent does not equal destruction. This was created with that in mind.

The MiniMap was designed to hold the minimum amount of widgets in memory, which can be a feature that is easily over looked. This was a performance feature that prevents the creation of one off widgets when possible, due to the fact that by default all widgets remain in memory once created.

Number of Blueprints: 5
List of Features:
- Built in Zoom (works with the scroll wheel)
- Circular and Square tracking supported
- Edge tracking (for when the tracked object goes beyond the edge of the minimap)
- Click the minimap to return the 3D space equivalent

Intended Platform: Windows
Platforms Tested: Windows
Documentation Included: Yes (in the project)
Important/Additional Notes: The MiniMap was designed to hold the minimum amount of widgets in memory, which can be a feature that is easily over looked. -Not required but a special thanks in credits is always appreciated.
